administration.description: Extend the functionality of Meetlily Apps (ERP) by building custom applications that cater to your unique business processes. Leverage the suite's development capabilities to create tailored solutions.

administration.name: Integrations
administration.description: Seamlessly integrate with various third-party services and applications. Connect and synchronize data with CRM systems, payment gateways, marketing platforms, and more.

administration.name: Organization
administration.description: Manage your company details, including profile, contact information, and legal documents. Customize the suite to align with your company's branding and requirements.

administration.description: Comprehensive user management capabilities. Create and manage user accounts, assign roles and permissions, and control access to features and modules.

administration.name: Themes
administration.description: Comprehensive user management capabilities. Create and manage user accounts, assign roles and permissions, and control access to features and modules.

administration.description: Customize Meetlily Apps (ERP) to suit your business needs. Configure preferences, adjust system behavior, and tailor the suite to your specific requirements.

applications.name: Accounting
applications.description: Manage financial transactions and track company's financial health with the Accounting module of Meetlily Apps. Handle invoices, expenses, and generate financial reports. Streamline your financial management processes.

applications.name: Point of Sale
applications.description: Streamline your sales process and manage transactions with the Point of Sale module of Meetlily Apps. Handle customer orders, process payments, and generate sales reports. Improve your retail operations.

applications.name: Website
applications.description: Build and customize your website with ease using the Website module of Meetlily Apps. Choose from a variety of templates, add content, and personalize your site. Showcase your products, services, and brand effectively.

applications.name: e-Commerce
applications.description: Set up an online store and start selling products with the e-Commerce module of Meetlily Apps. Manage inventory, process orders, and accept secure payments. Reach a wider audience and grow your business online.

applications.name: Invoicing
applications.description: Simplify your invoicing process and manage payments with the Invoicing module of Meetlily Apps. Create professional invoices, track payments, and send reminders. Stay organized and get paid faster.

applications.name: Sales
applications.description: Optimize your sales process and track your revenue with the Sales module of Meetlily Apps. Capture leads, manage opportunities, and close deals. Gain insights into your sales performance and drive growth.

applications.name: Subscriptions
applications.description: Offer subscription-based services and manage recurring payments with the Subscriptions module of Meetlily Apps. Create subscription plans, handle billing cycles, and automate subscription management. Retain customers and grow your subscription business.

applications.name: Timesheet
applications.description: Capture and manage employee work hours with the Timesheet module of Meetlily Apps. Keep track of time spent on projects, tasks, or clients. Streamline payroll processes.

applications.name: Warehouse
applications.description: Streamline your inventory management process with the Warehouse module of Meetlily Apps. Track stock levels, manage suppliers, and optimize warehouse operations. Gain real-time visibility into your inventory and reduce costs.

applications.description: Efficiently manage your club and membership with the Club module of Meetlily Apps. Track member details, handle membership renewals, and organize club events. Enhance member engagement and streamline administrative tasks.

applications.name: Restaurant
applications.description: Efficiently manage your restaurant operations with the Restaurant module of Meetlily Apps. Handle table reservations, track orders, and streamline kitchen operations. Enhance customer experience and optimize your restaurant's efficiency.

applications.name: Payments
applications.description: Simplify payment processing and transaction management with the Payments module of Meetlily Apps. Accept online payments, handle refunds, and track financial transactions. Ensure secure and seamless payment experiences for your customers.

applications.name: Contracts
applications.description: Efficiently manage contracts and agreements with the Contracts module of Meetlily Apps. Create and store contracts, track key dates, and automate contract workflows. Streamline your contract management process and improve compliance.

applications.name: Proposals
applications.description: Create professional business proposals and manage the proposal lifecycle with the Proposals module of Meetlily Apps. Customize proposal templates, track proposal status, and collaborate with stakeholders. Streamline your proposal management process and win more business.

applications.name: Employee
applications.description: Efficiently manage employee information and records with the Employee module of Meetlily Apps. Store employee profiles, track attendance, and manage leave requests. Streamline your HR processes and improve employee management.

applications.name: Jobs
applications.description: Efficiently manage job postings and applications with the Jobs module of Meetlily Apps. Create job listings, track applications, and streamline the hiring process. Attract top talent and make informed hiring decisions.

applications.name: HR
applications.description: Streamline your human resources processes with the HR module of Meetlily Apps. Handle employee onboarding, performance reviews, and HR workflows. Simplify HR tasks and improve employee engagement.

applications.name: Projects
applications.short_description: Manage projects and collaborate with teams.

applications.name: Conference

applications.description: Efficiently schedule and manage meetings with the Meetings module of Meetlily Apps. Create meeting invitations, send reminders, and track attendance. Streamline your meeting management process and improve collaboration.

applications.short_description: Organize and manage events of any scale.

applications.name: CRM
applications.description: Efficiently manage customer relationships and interactions with the CRM module of Meetlily Apps. Keep track of customer information, manage leads and opportunities, and streamline your sales process. Enhance customer satisfaction and drive business growth.

applications.name: Inventory
applications.description: Efficiently track and manage inventory with the Inventory module of Meetlily Apps. Monitor stock levels, track product movement, and streamline your supply chain. Optimize inventory management and reduce costs.

applications.name: Financial
applications.description: Efficiently manage financial operations and transactions with the Financial module of Meetlily Apps. Track income and expenses, generate financial reports, and streamline your accounting processes. Gain insights into your financial health and make informed decisions.

applications.name: Expenses
applications.description: Efficiently track and manage business expenses with the Expenses module of Meetlily Apps. Capture receipts, categorize expenses, and generate expense reports. Streamline your expense management process and gain control over your business spending.

applications.name: Ticketing
applications.description: Efficiently manage and track customer tickets with the Ticketing module of Meetlily Apps. Create support tickets, assign agents, and track ticket status. Streamline your customer support process and enhance customer satisfaction.

applications.description: Efficiently manage bookings and reservations with the Booking module of Meetlily Apps. Accept online bookings, manage availability, and send booking confirmations. Streamline your booking process and improve customer satisfaction.

applications.name: Products
applications.short_description: Manage and organize your product catalog.

applications.name: Shipping
applications.description: Efficiently manage shipping and delivery processes with the Shipping module of Meetlily Apps. Generate shipping labels, track packages, and manage delivery schedules. Streamline your shipping operations and provide a seamless delivery experience to your customers.

applications.name: Hosting
applications.description: Manage your hosting services, including virtual, dedicated, cloud servers, web, email, and database hosting, with the Hosting module of Meetlily Apps (ERP). Track server resources, handle configurations, and ensure reliable hosting services.

applications.name: Forms
applications.description: Create and manage custom forms and surveys with the Forms module of Meetlily Apps (ERP). Collect data, analyze responses, and gain insights into customer preferences. Streamline data collection processes.

tools.name: Music
tools.description: Enjoy a built-in music player that allows you to listen to your favorite tunes while working. Create playlists, shuffle songs, and adjust volume settings without leaving Meetlily Apps (ERP). Stay focused and motivated with your personalized music selection.

tools.name: Movies
tools.description: Access a curated collection of movies within Meetlily Apps (ERP). Browse through different genres, watch trailers, and stream movies directly from the platform. Enjoy your favorite films during your downtime or as a source of inspiration.

tools.name: Sign
tools.description: Easily create and manage digital signatures with the Sign tool in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Sign documents electronically, securely store your signatures, and streamline the signing process. Ensure efficient and legally binding document workflows.

tools.name: Contacts
tools.description: Manage your contacts efficiently with the Contacts feature in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Store contact details, categorize contacts, and easily search for specific individuals or organizations. Keep your contact information organized and accessible.

tools.name: Dashboard
tools.description: Access a customizable dashboard within Meetlily Apps (ERP) to get an overview of your key metrics and important information. Configure widgets, charts, and graphs to display data relevant to your business. Stay informed and make data-driven decisions.

tools.name: File Management
tools.description: Effortlessly manage your files and documents with the File Management tool in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Upload, organize, and share files securely. Collaborate with team members and ensure easy access to important documents.

tools.name: Blocks, Components, and Templates
tools.description: Access a library of pre-designed blocks, components, and templates within Meetlily Apps (ERP). Easily create professional-looking websites, landing pages, and email templates. Customize and reuse these elements to save time and maintain consistency.

tools.name: Gallery
tools.description: Organize and showcase your images and media files with the Gallery feature in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Create albums, add descriptions, and share your visual content with others. Present your work or memories in a visually appealing manner.

tools.name: Todo List
tools.description: Stay organized and manage your tasks effectively with the Todo List feature in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Create to-do lists, set deadlines, and track your progress. Prioritize your tasks and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

tools.name: Draw
tools.description: Unleash your creativity with the Draw tool in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Sketch, doodle, and create digital artwork directly within the platform. Express your ideas visually and collaborate with others on design projects.

tools.name: Icons
tools.description: Access a wide range of icons within Meetlily Apps (ERP) to enhance your user interfaces and visual elements. Choose from a diverse collection of icons and easily integrate them into your projects. Customize the appearance and style of the icons to match your branding.

tools.name: Notes/Markdown Editor
tools.description: Take notes and write in Markdown format with the Notes/Markdown Editor in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Create rich-text documents, format text, and add images. Organize your notes and access them whenever you need to reference or share information.

tools.name: Flow
tools.description: Visualize your data and processes with the Flow and Diagrams tool in Meetlily Apps (ERP). Create flowcharts, diagrams, and visual representations of your workflows. Gain insights and communicate complex ideas effectively.

tools.name: Connect
tools.description: Collaborate with team members and clients through chat and video conferences within Meetlily Apps (ERP). Initiate real-time conversations, share screens, and hold virtual meetings. Foster effective communication and enhance collaboration.

tools.name: Fonts
tools.description: Manage your fonts and typography within Meetlily Apps (ERP). Upload and organize your font files, preview different fonts, and apply them to your projects. Ensure consistent and visually appealing typography across your designs.

tools.name: AI
tools.description: Leverage the power of artificial intelligence within Meetlily Apps (ERP). Generate content using AI algorithms, implement machine learning models, and utilize a bot assistant for automated tasks. Enhance efficiency and explore innovative solutions.
